radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple ill-defined coalescing pulmonary nodules, bilaterally but primarily in the peripheral right lower lobe. The lesions are of varying sizes, up to approximately 3 cm in diameter, with air bronchograms and no evidence of calcification or cavitation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At follow-up CT scan 2 months after antifungal therapy, the nodular lesions had not resolved.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked FDG avidity of the nodules in both lower lobes and increased metabolic activity of the pleura of the right lung.
